short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes your inbox zero pretty with a new beautiful image from unsplash every day. Open source + Privacy preserving

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you hit inbox zero in a gmail inbox you will see a beautiful image, a new one every day. Just like in superhuman!
